description.short: uCoin Server allows one to host uCoin nodes of any uCoin currency.
description.long: uCoin Server is a cryptocurrency server that allows you to create and host Universal Basic Income currencies. This way one can realize a monetary system that not only touches everyone globally, but distributes it such a way, that it is free of corruption, bureaucracy and injustice, that could never be achieved otherwise in an semi- to fully-automated economy.
